channel.title: Comments for Los Angeles Visionaries Association

item.title: Comment on Kim Cooper signing at the 37th Annual Los Angeles Vintage Paperback Show by Kim Cooper
item.dc:creator: Kim Cooper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/event/kim-cooper-signing-at-the-37th-annual-los-angeles-vintage-paperback-show/#comment-1737">Lynda D. Pollock</a>.
This signing takes place from 1-2pm during the L.A. Vintage Paperback Show, and you can purchase show tickets at the door of the Glendale Civic Auditorium. Hope to see you there!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lynda D. Pollock.

This signing takes place from 1-2pm during the L.A. Vintage Paperback Show, and you can purchase show tickets at the door of the Glendale Civic Auditorium. Hope to see you there!

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by Marie Pabon
item.dc:creator: Marie Pabon
item.description: Please, Reinvest in Hollywood. Keep the Dream A live. We need the Stories of hope,Joy,Tragedy and Love... Thank you. Marie Pabon
item.content:encoded:
Please, Reinvest in Hollywood. Keep the Dream A live. We need the Stories of hope,Joy,Tragedy and Love…
Thank you.
Marie Pabon

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by Randall Hyde
item.dc:creator: Randall Hyde
item.description: This is a very important part of Hollywood history. Please don't take this important landmark.
item.content:encoded: This is a very important part of Hollywood history. Please don’t take this important landmark.

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by John Orland
item.dc:creator: John Orland
item.description: Hollywood can ill-afford to lose any more of its landmarks.
item.content:encoded: Hollywood can ill-afford to lose any more of its landmarks.

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by Darryl Haase
item.dc:creator: Darryl Haase
item.description: Hollywood needs to be more mindful of its history. So many remnants of its glorious past have been carelessly destroyed and discarded in the name of progress and business. Saving and preserving the RKO Globe, which towered over one of the great Hollywood studios during the golden era, is a small endeavor compared to the backlots, sets and soundstages that have already been demolished. Please learn from past errors and save this beautiful sculpture for future generations of fans and filmmakers. Thank you from a dedicated fan of RKO.
item.content:encoded: Hollywood needs to be more mindful of its history. So many remnants of its glorious past have been carelessly destroyed and discarded in the name of progress and business. Saving and preserving the RKO Globe, which towered over one of the great Hollywood studios during the golden era, is a small endeavor compared to the backlots, sets and soundstages that have already been demolished. Please learn from past errors and save this beautiful sculpture for future generations of fans and filmmakers. Thank you from a dedicated fan of RKO.

item.title: Comment on Include A Restoration Option For The Pershing Square Design Competition by Russell
item.dc:creator: Russell
item.description: I remember the original park. I would stay at the Biltmore with my parents and walk through the park under the shade trees to the hotel. Later I was appalled at what had been done to the park after the garage was installed. The same thing happened to the Civic Center Park in San Francisco when a garage was installed. The lesson is that putting a garage under a park doesn't usually work out good for the park.
item.content:encoded: I remember the original park. I would stay at the Biltmore with my parents and walk through the park under the shade trees to the hotel. Later I was appalled at what had been done to the park after the garage was installed. The same thing happened to the Civic Center Park in San Francisco when a garage was installed. The lesson is that putting a garage under a park doesn’t usually work out good for the park.

item.title: Comment on Include A Restoration Option For The Pershing Square Design Competition by Federico Bustamante
item.dc:creator: Federico Bustamante
item.description: John Parkinson's contributions to our magnificent city spread far and wide, including the original and majestic design for Pershig Square. Let's restore it to it's former glory!
item.content:encoded: John Parkinson’s contributions to our magnificent city spread far and wide, including the original and majestic design for Pershig Square. Let’s restore it to it’s former glory!

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by Jody Jaress
item.dc:creator: Jody Jaress
item.description:
Why in the world wouldn't you want to keep an historical structure. If indeed you wish to remodel... great, but not at the expense, destruction of something that represents so much of the past in our film and entertainment town.... known all over the world! Let's not forget who and what events paid into this community. Keep the history. Keep our past image. Keep our reminder of (maybe) a more glamorous day. However you need to say it, read it.... reconsider the possibility of RESPECTING what once was.
Thanks much for your wanting to improve... but keep visual memories.
item.content:encoded:
Why in the world wouldn’t you want to keep an historical structure. If indeed you wish to remodel… great, but not at the expense, destruction of something that represents so much of the past in our film and entertainment town…. known all over the world! Let’s not forget who and what events paid into this community. Keep the history. Keep our past image. Keep our reminder of (maybe) a more glamorous day. However you need to say it, read it…. reconsider the possibility of RESPECTING what once was.

Thanks much for your wanting to improve… but keep visual memories.

item.title: Comment on Save the RKO Globe by Rudolph Poodaluski
item.dc:creator: Rudolph Poodaluski
item.description: The historical value of the RKO Globe should not be so easily swept aside. On studio lots space is a limited commodity and new directions are the trend of the business, but can you not find a way to preserve the best of industry history.
item.content:encoded: The historical value of the RKO Globe should not be so easily swept aside. On studio lots space is a limited commodity and new directions are the trend of the business, but can you not find a way to preserve the best of industry history.
